name: Mizoram University
overview: A Central University accredited with NAAC 'A' Grade, serving as the primary affiliating body for colleges in the state. It offers a wide array of UG, PG, and doctoral programs.

name: National Institute of Technology Mizoram
overview: An Institute of National Importance established in 2010. It currently operates from a temporary campus in Chaltlang while its permanent campus comes up in Lengpui.

name: Zoram Medical College
overview: The first and only medical college in Mizoram, formerly known as MIMER. It is a state government institution attached to the State Referral Hospital.

name: Regional Institute of Paramedical and Nursing Sciences
overview: An autonomous institute under the Ministry of Health & Family Welfare, Govt. of India, set up to provide paramedical and nursing education to the North East region.

name: Pachhunga University College
overview: The only constituent college of Mizoram University and the oldest college in the state. It is NAAC 'A+' accredited and serves as a model undergraduate institution.

name: College of Veterinary Sciences & Animal Husbandry, Selesih
overview: A constituent college of the Central Agricultural University (Imphal), dedicated to veterinary education and research.

name: The ICFAI University, Mizoram
overview: A private university established under the Mizoram State Act, offering management, commerce, and arts programs.

name: Government Zirtiri Residential Science College
overview: A premier government science college in Aizawl, offering undergraduate science degrees.

courses.name: B.Sc (Physics, Chem, Math, Botany, Zoology, Home Science)

name: Government Hrangbana College
overview: A leading government college in Aizawl, particularly strong in Commerce and Arts. Accredited with NAAC 'A' grade.

name: Government T. Romana College
overview: A prominent government college affiliated to Mizoram University, offering arts courses.

name: Government Aizawl North College
overview: A government college offering undergraduate courses in arts and humanities.

name: Government Aizawl West College
overview: Located in the western part of Aizawl, providing arts education to a large number of students.

name: Government Johnson College
overview: A government college in Aizawl, known for its history and arts programs.

name: Government J. Thankima College
overview: A government college serving the Bawngkawn area, affiliated with Mizoram University.

name: Lunglei Government College
overview: The premier higher education institution in the southern district of Lunglei.

name: Government Champhai College
overview: A government college located near the Myanmar border, offering arts, science, and commerce streams.

name: Government Serchhip College
overview: A government college serving the Serchhip district, offering undergraduate courses.

name: Government Saiha College
overview: Situated in the southern tip of Mizoram, serving the Mara Autonomous District Council area.

name: Government Lawngtlai College
overview: A government college serving the Lai Autonomous District Council area.

name: Government Mamit College
overview: The primary higher education institution in the western district of Mamit.

name: Government Kolasib College
overview: A government college in the northern district of Kolasib.

name: Government Saitual College
overview: A government college in the newly created Saitual district.

name: Government Khawzawl College
overview: Providing higher education to students in the Khawzawl district.

name: Government Hnahthial College
overview: A government college in Hnahthial district.

name: Government Zawlnuam College
overview: A government college serving the western border areas of Mizoram.

name: Higher and Technical Institute of Mizoram
overview: A private Christian college run by the Baptist Church of Mizoram, offering professional and general courses.

name: Government Mizoram Law College
overview: The premier government law college in the state, offering LL.B. degree.

name: Institute of Advanced Study in Education
overview: A government teacher education institute offering B.Ed and M.Ed programs.

name: National Institute of Electronics & Information Technology Aizawl
overview: A central government institute offering IT and electronics courses, affiliated to Mizoram University for BCA/MCA.

name: Mizoram Polytechnic Lunglei
overview: The oldest government polytechnic in Mizoram offering diploma engineering courses.

affiliations: Mizoram State Council for Technical Education

name: Women's Polytechnic Aizawl
overview: A government polytechnic institute exclusively for women, offering diploma courses in modern office practice, electronics, and beauty culture.

affiliations: Mizoram State Council for Technical Education

name: National Institute of Technology Mizoram
overview: NIRF Ranked Engineering Institute
